alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Nelson; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Grand Forks, eastern Nelson, northwestern Traill and northern Steele Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over McCanna, or 28 miles west of Grand Forks, moving south at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grand Forks AFB, Larimore, Thompson, Northwood, Hatton, Golden Lake and Emerado. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 117 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
